D’ailleurs avec le prêt reçu elle va acheter 2 moutons et de l’aliment de bétail, son mari se charge de l’embouche et de la vente des bêtes.
Avec les bénéfices elle compte se doter de matériels dont elle a besoins dans son foyer. Elle prend ne charge aussi ses enfants dans leurs besoins scolaires et médicaux.
texts.en:
This group of 10 women is part of the "banc villageois" which was created on the 6th of July, 2006. The group is made up of women who live in the same village and neighbouring villages. Most of them are traders.

Khady, who is married and the mother of 2 boys, is 35 years old. She is standing and raising her hand in the picture. She practises livestock fattening and works with her husband. With the loan she receives she will buy 2 sheep and livestock feed, and her husband will take care of fattening and reselling the animals. She plans to use the profits to get material she needs for her home. She also takes care of her children's school and medical expenses.

loans.use: to buy 2 sheep.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven muy trabajador, gracias a su venta ambulante y el grupo musical que tiene ayuda a su familia, tiene los ingresos que necesita para cubrir el día a día a día y también trata de ir mejorando su vida. El se define a si mismo como una persona muy luchadora que quiere salir adelante.
Cuenta que con su crédito anterior pudo comprarse un instrumento musical para su grupo musical, hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de un globo loco para poder utilizarlo en la animación de cumpleaños y demás, y de esa forma poder crecer. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo, ya que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Cesar is a very hard working young man. Thanks to working as a street vendor and in the musical group he has he is helping his family. He has the income he needs to cover the day to day costs and he also is trying to improve his quality of life. He defines himself as a fighter who wants to get ahead.  

He says that with the previous loan, he was able to buy a musical instrument for his group. Now he is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in for birthday parties so that he can grow. He is grateful for the opportunity he is receiving, since it will be a big help.

loans.use: to buy a bounce house.

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
Erika vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de villa nuevo de la ciudad de La Paz; tiene dos hijos, se dedica a la venta de buzos deportivos y poleras en sociedad con su hermana, efectuando la venta en diferentes pueblos del altiplano cercanos a la ciudad de El Alto.

El crédito que solicita es para poder aumentar su capital e independizarse ya que ella cuenta con un capital mínimo y lo que quiere es traer más mercadería (buzos deportivos y poleras).

El sueño de Erika es tener su propio negocio y mejorar sus ingresos ya que necesita mantener a sus hijos pues está separada del esposo.
texts.en:
Erika lives in her parents' house in the area of Villa Nuevo in the city of La Paz. She has two children and she sells sports shirts and sweatshirts with her sister. She sell in different towns nearby the city of El Alto.

The loan she is asking for is to be able to increase her capital and become independent, since she has minimal capital and what she wants is to bring in more merchandise (sports shirts and sweatshirts).  

Erika's dream is to have her own business and improve her income, since she needs to support her children and is separated from her husband.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of sports shirts and sweatshirts to become independent and sell her products to her customers.

loans.name: Codou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 16 femmes fait parti du Banc Villageois qui a été crée le 06/07/2006. Ce dernier est composé par des femmes qui habitent le même village et des villages environnants. Elles pratiquent pour la plupart comme activité le commerce. 
Debout à droite et levant la main, Isseu est âgée de 32 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont une fille. Elle fait comme activité le commerce, elle vend des légumes et du poisson frais. Elle se rend chaque jour dans la ville pour s'approvisionner en produits et l'écoulement se fait au niveau son village.
Avec le prêt reçu elle va acheter 1/2 caisse de poisson et pour chaque variétés de légumes elle achète 10kg.
Les bénéfices lui permettent à chaque fois que la nourriture de la famille manque de la renforcer.Avec les bénéfices elle prend aussi en charge les besoins de ses enfants, elle épargne aussi.
texts.en:
This group of 16 women is part of the "banc villageois" which was created on the 6th of July, 2006. The group is made up of women who live in the same village and neighbouring villages. Most of them are traders.

Isseu is standing on the right of the picture and raising her hand. She is 32 years old, married and the mother of 6 children, one of whom is a girl. She is a merchant and sells vegetables and fresh fish. She goes to town each days to get her supplies and resells them in her village. She will buy half a box of fish and 10 kilos of each type of vegetable with the loan she receives. The profits enable her to buy more food for her family each time they run out. She also uses the profits to take care of her children's needs and also saves some money.

loans.use: to buy fish and vegetables.

loans.name: Bintou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 5 femmes fait parti du Banc Villageois qui a été crée le 06/07/2006. Il est composé de 5 femmes qui habitent le même village et des villages environnants. Elles pratiquent pour la plupart comme activité le commerce.
Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, Fatou est âgée de 55 ans. Elle est veuve, elle est mère de 4 filles et a en charge 1 neveu. Elle fait comme activité de la tricoterie et la couture.
Avec le prêt reçu elle compte acheter du tissu bassin trois façons, du tissu en coton. Elle va acheter 5 kg à 3000f le kg pour confectionner 15 draps. Elle va aussi acheter des paquets de fil pour la broderie des draps, des pagnes et pour la tricoterie.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de soutenir sa famille, étant veuve c’est elle qui s’occupe de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group of 5 women is part of the "banc villageois" which was created on the 6th of July, 2006. The group is made up of women who live in the same village and neighbouring villages. Most of them are traders.

Fatou is standing on the right of the picture and raising her hand. She is 55 years old, widowed and the mother of 4 girls. She is also raising a nephew. She knits and sews. With the loans she receives, she plans to buy 3 types of damask fabric, other fabric and cotton thread. She will buy 5 kilos of fabric at 3 000 francs per kilo and make 15 sheets. She will also buy packets of thread with which to embroider sheets and pagnes (highly decorative and colourful West African clothing) and buy some yarn for knitting. Her profits enable her to support her family - being a widow, she is the one who takes care of her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Franck Elvis

texts.fr: Franck est un jeune homme  de 27 ans célibataire sans enfants. il fait la vente en détail des vivres frais (tomate, maniocs, plantains, noix de palmes et fruits) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 5 ans. Il a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'il a acquis au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine et souhaiterai son stock de cajots de tomates pour avoir un bon stock ce qui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande constante de sa clientèle et d'éviter les ruptures de stocks. Il économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Franck is a young 27-year-old man who is single and has no children. He has been selling fresh seasonal food (tomatoes, cassava, plantains, coconuts and fruit) at a local market to retail customers for 5 years. He knows the suppliers well and knows his customers, which he has acquired over time thanks to his experience in his line of work, especially well. He would like to increase his stock of crates of tomatoes in order to have a good inventory which will enable him to better satisfy the constant demand of his customer and to avoid stock shortages. He will save his profits not only to expand his business, but also to take care of his family's needs.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of crates of tomatoes.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta and her husband live in the village of Lchacshen, which is in Gegharkunik area. Both of them are engaged in farming and agriculture. They have a plot of private land where they cultivate carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, cucumbers and some greens. Their farm is not a very big one; they keep three cows, three calves and twenty chickens. All these they manage to care for while working at other jobs. Marieta works at the Building Department as an engineer. Marieta’s husband also works; he has a small vegetable trading business in the city Sevan. For many years,Marieta and her husband have worked very hard day and night in order to have their own farm and another source of income for their family. 
    Marieta is asking for a loan of 1,000,000 AMD to enlarge her farm cattle; she wants to buy two cows, six piglets and ten sheep, as well as some fodder for animals. It is Marieta’s first deal with Kiva lenders and she hopes that she has found the perfect partner to support her in her business.

loans.use: to buy two cows, six piglets and ten sheep, as well as some fodder for animals

loans.name: Alter

texts.en: Alter, 47, is married and has two children. He lives in Calabayan, Ozamiz City. Alter provides motor transport services in his village, earning a monthly income of 8,000 PHP. Aside from this, he also has a farm planting and harvesting corn and root crops for sale. Alter has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure and finance the costs of weeding. His plan for his and his family's future is to acquire another vehicle for transportation.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure and finance the costs of weeding.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Don Alfonso es señor muy trabajador. el tiene una vaca con la que produce leche para vender en la comunidad. sin embargo necesita poder aumentar la producción, por lo que solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones para comprar dos vacas mas y así poder mejorar su negocio
texts.en:
Alfonso is a hard working man.

He has a cow to produce milk to sell in the community. 

However, he needs to increase production, and so he is asking for a loan of one million colones in order to buy two more cows so he can improve his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for milk production

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith lives in the Litein area of Kenya. She has 8 children and has been doing this work for 12 years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, and tea.

She stated that she enjoys farming, and that her biggest challenge is poor weather. An animal on the farm has been given the name Karoi.

Judith was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: "Good and affordable interest rates." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, and she said that the organization offers low-interest loans. 

Her highest monthly expenses are school fees. She says that this loan will allow her family to get more income. 

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Judith owns a cow and poultry, but does not own a pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has a mosquito net in the household but does not have electricity, solar power, running water, a sewing machine, a TV, or a DVD player. 

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: to construct a zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres Maravillosas Group

texts.es: Dúo Mujeres Maravillosas, este grupo esta conformado por la señora Guadalupe de 39 años de edad ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas desde hace varios años ya que esta actividad es la forma de como ella ayuda a su familia, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz por mayor y para la compra de leña para la elaboracion de tortillas, espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado ya que es de mucha yuda para su negocio.
texts.en:
The group Dúo Mujeres Maravillosas was formed by Guadalupe who is 39 years old. 

She has been working for several years making and selling tortillas as this is the way she supports her family. 

She is asking for this loan to buy wholesale corn and to buy firewood in order to make tortillas. She hopes that you can help with the request as it would be a big help for her business.

loans.use: to buy corn to be used in her typical work

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкату 47 лет. Он женат и имеет 1 сына и 2 внуков. Его сыну 24 года. Шавкат более 10 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры и скотоводством, так как он живет в сельской местности и его местожительство весьма благополучный как для животноводства, так и для земледелия. Его заботливая жена помогает ему введению бизнеса. Его сын зарабатывает в Российской Федерации. Шавкат хочет отремонтировать свой дом, так как его дом имеет плохое состояние. Он запрашивает займ для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shavkat is 47, married, and has a son and two grandchildren. His son is 24 years old and works in Russia. Shavkat has been planting crops and raising cattle for over ten years. He lives in a rural area where the land is favorable for both livestock and agriculture, and his caring wife helps him on the farm. Shavkat wants to repair his house, which is in bad condition. He is asking for a loan to purchase construction materials such as cement and wood. He is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing house

loans.name: Ilyos

texts.ru: Ильёс является скотоводом и фермером. Он проживает в селе Вогат, джамоате Сабристон города Истаравшан. Ему 36 лет. У него семья - жена и дети. Старшей дочери 10 лет, второй дочери 9 лет, старшему сыну 7 лет, а младшему сыну 1 месяц. Ильёс единственный кормилец в семье, так как жена не работает, она ухаживает за детьми. Ильёс в течение 12 лет занимается куплей и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он закупает по 9 голов бычков и после двух месяца их откорма продает на рынке с наценкой. Полученную прибыль он тратит на семейные расходы. Ильёс нуждается в кредите, чтобы закупить крупнорогатый скот. Данный кредит поможет ему продолжить деятельность и за счет прибыли обеспечивать семью.
texts.en: Ilyos raises cattle and is a farmer. He lives in the village of Vorat, in the Sabriston area and town of Istaravshan. He is 36 years old.  He has a family - a wife and children. The oldest daughter is 10 years old, the second oldest is 9, the oldest son is 7, and the youngest son is 1 month old. Ilyos is the sole breadwinner of the family, as his wife does not work because she takes care of the children.  Over the course of 12 months, Ilyos has been engaged in buying and selling cattle. He purchases 9 steers at a time, and, after fattening them up for two months, sells them at the market for profit. He uses the money he makes for family expenses. Ilyos needs a loan in order to purchase cattle. This loan will allow him to continue his business and use the profits to provide for his family.

loans.use: To purchase and sell cattle

loans.name: Himmat

texts.ru: Химмат образованная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Химмат является основной кормилицей в семье, так как ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Химмат более 4 лет работает в больнице своего села. Она работает медсестрой. Химмат хочет отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Himmat is an educated and hardworking woman. She is 36 years old. She is married and is raising two children. Himmat is the main breadwinner in the family, because her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. For over four years, Himmat has worked in the local village hospital. She works as a nurse. Himmat would like to repair her house, but doesn't have enough money. She is requesting a loan of $1,000 USD to purchase building materials. She awaits your  kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair her house

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is a 22-year-old single lady who is employed in a television station to make money to pay for her university tuition fees. 

Walaa works in the documentation department, which is suitable with her university major and provides her with added experience.

Walaa has to pay for her university fees and her own needs, but her salary isn't enough to cover both needs easily. That's why she is applying for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua.

She hopes to finish her studies soon, which would allow her to get a new job and salary and decrease her expenses.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Baltazar

texts.es: El socio Baltazar nació en la ciudad de Pilco – Grande y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 43 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura, al ganado y también a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros, él requiere el préstamo para comprar ganado, él está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas. (La comunidad de Pilco – Grande está ubicado en el distrito de Huayllabamba dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo en el  departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
The member, Baltazar, was born in the city of Pilco Grande and lives in the same city where he was born. He is 43 years old and has a common-law relationship from which he has six children. 

He works in agriculture and livestock and he breeds small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and others. 

He needs a loan in order to buy cattle. He is happy about the loan and he agrees to complete his payment according to the plan.

The community of Pilco Grande is located in the district of Huayllabamba, in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: El Sr. Roger tiene 28 años,  casado con un hijo pequeño,  ella se dedica al comercio de variedad de carne en su carnicería que se encuentran en la zona de Antofagasta,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Roger va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un congelador grande para conservar sus productos en buen estado su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que requiere la congeladora para la venta de carne., el Sr. Roger enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que hay varias carnicerías en la zona, pero el tiene mucha clientela por la amabilidad con la que trata a su clientela y  va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de otra congeladora grande, su deseo para su negocio es tener un negocio estable y rentable y de esta manera incrementar sus ingresos económicos y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Roger is 28 years old and is married with a young son and works selling a variety of meat in his butcher’s shop which is located in the area of Antofagasta.

This is his first loan with the institution. Roger is going to use the loan to buy a big freezer in order to keep his products in good condition, so he is applying for the loan as he needs a freezer for the sale of meat.

Roger faces challenges in his business such as competition as there are several butchers in the area, but he has a lot of customers because of the kindness with which he serves his clientele and he will use the loan to buy another large freezer.

His desire for his business is to have a stable and profitable business and in this way increase his financial income in order to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the tax to legalize a vehicle he purchased to help deliver concrete blocks to his clients

loans.name: Solidario Rosas Del Campo Group

texts.es:
Solidario Rosas del Campo
Audelina es madre soltera tuvo ocho hijos de los cuales ya todos han formado su propia familia, ella inicio su negocio hace ocho años,  ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa, delantales, gabachas y ropa de cama, también viaja tres veces al año a Tapachula de donde trae utensilios de cocina y ropa para dama,  ella solicita el crédito ya que necesita capital para poder invertir en su negocio, agradece a FAPE/ KIVA  ya que este es el cuarto crédito que obtendrá. El sueño más grande es tener un local en el cual ella pueda exhibir  su producto.
texts.en:
The "Rosas del Campo" [Roses of the Countryside] Solidarity Group
Audelina is a single mother. She raised eight children, all of whom have now formed their own families. She started her business eight years ago. She works selling clothing, aprons, work uniforms, and bedsheets. She also travels three times a year to Tapachula, where she obtains kitchen utensils and women's clothing. She is requesting the loan because she needs capital to invest in her business. She is grateful to FAPE and Kiva, since this is the fourth loan she will obtain. Her greatest dream is to have a shop where she can display her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing to sell.

loans.name: Principiantes - 32 Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento PRINCIPIANTES – 32 está  compuesto por ocho  integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones, se dedican a distintas actividades, La presidenta del banco es la  Sra. Lizet tiene 23 años, casada con dos hijos pequeños, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano,  en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona de San pablo de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la  Sra. Lizet va a usar este préstamo para la compra de fardos de ropa de segunda mano para su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, la  Sra. Lizet enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que hay muchas personas que se dedican a esta actividad por la zona, va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, la  Sra. Lizet es una persona trabajadora, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella y a sus compañeras de grupo ya que se esfuerzan en el trabajo para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: The 'Principiantes - 32' community bank has eight members: six women and two men, who all work in different businesses.  The bank's president is Lizet.  Lizet is 23 years old, married, and has two young children.  Her business is selling used clothing from her sales location in San Pablo neighborhood, in the city of Cochabamba.  This loan is her first through the institution.  She will use it to buy bundles of used clothing for her business.  The reason she is requesting this loan is a lack of capital.  Lizet faces challenges in her business.  One of these challenges is the competition as there are many people who carry out the same business in her area. Lizet will use the profits she makes to continue improving her business.  Her goal is to have enough merchandise in stock that she can offer a good range of products to her customers.  Lizet is a hard-working person.  She feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they are giving her and her fellow group members.  All of the members of the group are working hard for the well-being of their families.

loans.use: to buy bundles of used clothing

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jose sigue con la misma actividad el es agricultor desde hace ya bastante tiempo, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de semillas para la siembra de papa, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la siembra de papa también comprara semillas y para el preparado de la tierra, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que está creciendo y mejorando su actividad.
texts.en: Jose continues working as a farmer, having been in this business for some time.  He says that his previous loan went well as he used it to buy potato seeds to sow.  He is also requesting a loan to sow potatoes on this occasion.  He will buy potato seed and prepare his land for planting.  Jose feels happy and grateful to the institution for the opportunity they are giving him as he is growing and improving his business.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds to sow and to prepare his land

loans.name: Aquiles

texts.es:
Aquiles tiene 44 años, esta casado con Gabriela de 23 años con quien tiene un hijo llamado Sharlo. Tiene una casa hecha de madera donde vive junto a su familia.Aquiles se dedica a la agricultura pero con el dinero que fue ahorrando puso un restaurante en el primer piso de su vivienda en donde con ayuda de su esposa se dedica  la venta de menú todos los días.Se siente muy orgulloso porque su esposa prepara diversos platos  con buen sabor y este fue el motivo para animarse por su actual negocio.Se inicio de a pocos  comprando mesas de plástico que remplazo por hechas de madera posteriormente.
Sus clientes son transportistas y pasajeros que toman como lugar de descanso su pueblo por hallarse en una carretera rural.Su principal inconveniente es la obtención de los productos que usa para preparar los alimentos porque vive en un poblado muy lejano teniendo que comprar los víveres a un precio muy elevado. 
Su deseo es construir su negocio a base de material noble y a la vez mejorar el ambiente de su negocio para recibir a sus comensales en un ambiente mas cómodo.Este es segundo préstamo que recibe por parte de KIVA; agradecer la oportunidad que los financistas le brindan porque le ayudan a trabajar con mayor facilidad.
Desea solicitar en esta ocasión 3,000 nuevos soles para comprar víveres al por mayor como sacos de arroz, azúcar y otros productos para su negocio
texts.en:
Aquiles, 44, is married to Gabriela, 23, with whom he has a son named Sharlo.  He has a house made of wood where he lives with his family.

Aquiles earns a living in agriculture, but with the money he saved he set up a restaurant on the first floor of his house.  His wife helps him sell meals every day.  He's very proud because his wife makes a variety of flavorful dishes, which motivated him to decide on his current business.  He started gradually, buying plastic tables that he later replaced with wooden ones. 

His customers are shippers and passengers who rest in his town because it's on a rural highway.  His main problem is getting the products he uses to prepare the meals because he lives in a very remote community and has to buy provisions at a high price.  He wants to build his business of quality materials as well as improve the ambiance so his diners will be more comfortable.

This is his second Kiva loan.  He's grateful for the opportunity the lenders are giving him because it helps him work more easily.

Currently he wants to request 3,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy provisions wholesale such as bags of rice, sugar, and other products for his business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and other products

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 49 years old and widowed with 3 children, all of her children are in school. Lourdes works very hard to provide for them.

Lourdes runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, soft-drinks, cooking oil and other seasonings. 

In the future, Lourdes would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
El señora Alba de 45 años de edad es  madre soltera,  vive con sus  dos hijos y sus nietos en la casa de un familiar, se dedica desde hace 20 años al negocio de venta de rosquillas, quesadillas y hojaldras, su venta la realiza  en los mercados de san Lorenzo, su venta es de lunes a sábado, doña Alba es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a esta actividad, es una mujer trabajadora que con su negocio piensa salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Alba esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de leña seca, maíz, cuajada y manteca, con el apoyo del préstamo ella mejorara su negocio y también sus ingresos, Ella está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener su propia casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - 06 de junio del 2013.
texts.en:
Alba is 45 years old and a single mother. She lives with her two children and her grandchildren in the home of a family member. For 20 years, she has worked in her business selling donuts, quesadillas and pastries. She sells her products in the markets of San Lorenzo. Her sales are made from Monday through Saturday. Alba is a hard-working woman who has worked in this field for a long time. She is a hard-working woman whose aim with her business is to get ahead with her family. 

Alba is requesting this loan to buy dried firewood, corn, fresh white cheese and shortening. With the help of the loan she will improve her business and also her income. She is very happy to continue working with Prisma.

Her dream is to have a house of her own. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June 6, 2013.

loans.use: to buy dried firewood, corn, fresh white cheese and shortening.

loans.name: Ma. Chona

texts.en:
As a married parent of 3 children, Ma. Chona works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines. Ma. Chona is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store (general store) business.

Ma. Chona has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.pt:
A Sra. Elisa é solteira e vive em casa própria com os seus 3 filhos menores. A base do seu sustento são receitas de vendas de produtos.
Ela precisa do empréstimo para compra de esteiras e cocos para revender. Os produtos são adquiridos na Província de Inhambane, cerca de 400 km de distância e revendidos em Maputo. 
Seu maior sonho é terminar a construção da sua casa e construir uma mercearia em sua casa para se instalar e fazer o seu negócio perto dos filhos.
Seu maior desafio é escolarizar os seus filhos.
texts.en:
Elisa is single and lives in her own house with her 3 minor children. She makes a living in the sale of various products. 

She is requesting this loan to buy mats and coconuts for resale. The products are bought in the Inhambane province, about 400 km away, and resold in Maputo.

Her dream is to finish building her house and build a grocery store in her house, so she can settle and do business close to her children.

Her biggest challenge is schooling her children.

loans.use: to buy mats and coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Almothana

texts.en:
Almothana has five siblings and was born in 1994. His father is deceased. Almothana lives in Almazad, Jordan, and is studying civil engineering at Tafila Technical Univeristy. 

Almothana is requesting a loan to pay for his semester fees and continue his studies. He aspires to graduate in order to be able to work and earn an income to improve his family's financial situation.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees and continue his studies

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a 45-year-old married woman with five children. She lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda, and operates a shop and also rears cattle to earn an income. Faith is very hardworking. Although she has managed to continue with her business, her major challenge is insufficient funds.

Faith is requesting a loan to buy general merchandise such as salt, sugar, and bread to sell. In the future, she dreams of educating her children and owning a ranch.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as salt, sugar, and bread

loans.name: Ma. Cristina

texts.en:
Ma. Cristina is a 43-year-old married woman with five children. Her oldest child is 24 and her youngest is four. Ma. Cristina is from Getafe, Bohol, and has been a rice farmer for more than ten years. 

Ma. Cristina is requesting a 6,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizer and pay labor costs for workers who flow and plant the rice. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business to be able to support her children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay labor costs

loans.name: Nazaria

texts.en:
Nazaria is married and works hard to provide for her family. For the past four years, she has run a general store in the Philippines. She has received previous loans through Kiva.

Nazaria is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, she aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad is married and works buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. She works hard to support four children. 

Trinidad is requesting an 1,800 PHP loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She will use her solar lamp as a backup light in case of emergency. Trinidad is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp

loans.name: Phylis

texts.en:
Phylis is a 44-year-old mother from Kakamega, which is located in the western part of Kenya. She is married to John, who is a businessman within the same location. She supports four people in her family and has four children who are 16, 12, 10 and 6 years old.

She has a tailoring shop, a business she has been doing for the last 10 years, and she makes a monthly income of KES 20,000. She is taking her second loan with KADET Ltd., which she will use to purchase cloth and repair the sewing machines. She will use the anticipated profit to plow back into the business.

Her dream is to expand the current business and take good care of her family.

loans.use: To purchase cloth and repair the sewing machines.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 38-year-old man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda.

With a vision of constructing a residential house, he made a decision to set up a bar alongside running a butcher shop to boost his income. Price fluctuation and weather changes are his major challenges. Patrick intends to use the loan to buy land.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Lily is a farmer who lives in the Litein area of Kenya. She has four children and has been doing this work for seven years.  Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, ad tea.

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: "Mixed farming." Her biggest challenge is "No funds." An animal on the farm have been given the name of "Kiplel."

Lily was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: "Because of good rates."  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required microfinance training session: "It gives the loan faster."

Her highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked how this loan will benefit her family, Lily replied, "More income."

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Lily owns a cow and poultry but does not own a pig, a pump, a bicycle, a motorcycle or an automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household mosquito nets but does not have electricity, solar power, running water, a sewing machine, a TV, or a DVD.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down."

loans.use: To purchase poultry.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 30 years old, married, and blessed with two children ages two and five. For the past six months, he has owned a retail shop where he sells a variety of goods and groceries. Richard earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES. 

Richard is requesting a 20,000 KES loan to purchase bales of flour, a sack of sugar, rice, detergents, and fruit to sell. He will use the profit from his loan to expand his business. In the future, Richard hopes to see his business grow and be able to provide for his family's basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase bales of flour, a sack of sugar, rice, detergents, and fruit

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth runs a sewing business. For almost 15 years, she has worked from eight in the morning through five in the afternoon. During this time, Elizabeth had developed her skills as a tailor and dressmaker. She has acquired good and loyal customers that help make her business productive.

Elizabeth is requesting a 50,000 PHP loan to buy different colors of fabric, needles, and thread. Elizabeth believes that her loan will be a great help to make her business more progressive and profitable for her family.

loans.use: to buy different colors of fabric, needles, and thread

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena es madre de 2 hijos de estado civil viuda ya que su esposo falleció hace un tiempo y la ayuda que ella tiene son sus dos hijos los cuales se involucran al salir de sus actividades escolares, sus padres y su hermano el cual vive en la misma casa de habitación su esposa y sus dos hijas. Ella se dedica a la caficultura desde muy pequeña actividad que es practicada por sus padres desde hace mucho tiempo y que en su familia es una tradición. Viendo la necesidad que hay en su hogar de generar un poco más de ingresos también tiene un pequeño negocio que es la venta de utensilios para cocina el cual le ha ayudado mucho para cubrir gastos básicos como la alimentación, medicina, etc. La propiedad que ella cultiva está ubicada a 25 minutos de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan en familia para dar mantenimiento y asistencia técnica.

Ella actualmente solicita ayuda para la compra fertilizantes y abono para poder cultivar y sembrar una nueva plantación de café.

Sus metas para esta cosecha es ser la mejor productora de café en la zona con la cual pueda alcanzar más credibilidad y clientela de la que ya tiene. Sus sueños como madre es poder preparar a sus hijos a nivel universitario para que ellos puedan tener una carrera que ayude a facilitarles un empleo, un proyecto o lo que ellos tengan planeado hacer en un futuro.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is a mother to two children.  She has been a widow since her husband died some time ago.  She receives help from her children when they come home from school, as well as her parents and brother.  María and her children live with her brother and his wife and two daughters.  María has been making a living growing coffee since a young age.  Her parents have been doing this work for a long time and it is a family tradition.  Seeing a need to generate more income for the household, María also has a business selling kitchen utensils.  This helps her greatly to cover basic costs such as food and medicines.  The land that María works is 25 minutes from her house.  The family travels there together to maintain and look after the crops.

María is currently applying for a loan to buy fertiliser and manure to sow and grow more coffee crops.

María's goal for this harvest is to be the best grower in the area.  That way she will grow in credibility and gain more customers.  As a mother, María's dream is to prepare her children to go to university so that they can study and find a job more easily.  This plan is for the future.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and manure to sow more coffee crops.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: Adrián tiene 41 años, es un hombre casado con 6 hijos y vive en una casa hecha de adobe , el cual compro con el fruto de su trabajo.Hace 25 años trabaja como agricultor en su localidad y se inicio con ayuda de sus padres quienes le cedieron un terreno agrícola de media hectárea en donde empezó a cultivar algunos productos de su zona como cacao, café y otros.De niño aprendió el oficio de la agricultura por sus padres y eso le sirve para realizar su trabajo actualmente.Tiene la suerte de contar con parcelas fértiles que garantizan una buena producción y usa abonos orgánicos como guano de aves para obtener una mejor calidad de los frutos. Cuando llega la temporada de cosecha contrata trabajadores del lugar y un vehículo para trasladar sus sacos con los granos secos desde el campo hasta la ciudad en donde los compradores de estos productos le pagan muy buenos precios.Desea trabajar con la motivación que lo caracteriza para comprar su propia movilidad y desminuir el precio por el transporte esperando incrementar sus ganancias.Este es segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante.En esta ocasión desea comprar 100 plantas de almácigo para reemplazar los árboles  de cacao desfasados de sus terrenos para garantizar una mayor producción en la próxima campaña.
texts.en:
Adrian is 41 years old, is married with 6 children, and lives in an adobe house which he bought with the fruits of his labour. He has worked as a farmer in his community for 25 years, and he began with the help of his parents who gave him a half-hectare plot of agricultural land on which he began to cultivate certain local products such as cocoa, coffee, and others.

He learned the farming trade from his parents from a young age and that helps him to carry out his work today. He is lucky enough to have fertile plots of land that guarantee a good yield, and he uses organic compost such as bird guano to obtain better quality produce. When harvest time comes around, he hires local labourers and a vehicle to transport his sacks containing dry beans from the countryside to the city, where purchasers of these products pay him good prices.

He wishes to work with his characteristic motivation so he can buy his own transport and reduce transportation costs, hoping in this way to increase his earnings. This is his second loan with Kiva and he feels extremely grateful for the financial support he receives to succeed. On this occasion, he wishes to buy 100 nursery plants to replace the old cocoa trees on his land, to ensure a higher yield during the next season.

loans.use: Compra de plantas de almácigo.

loans.name: Wily

texts.en:
Wily is 41 years old and married with three school-aged children. He works raising hogs to sell. Wily is a responsible father who aims to improve his livelihood to provide for the needs of his family. Despite his financial difficulties, he is determined to achieve his goals.

Wily is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan to buy needed feed, vitamins, and vaccines for his hogs. He believes his loan will enable him to improve his business. Wily hopes to continue sending his children to school so that they will earn degrees and someday find good jobs.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and vaccines for his hogs

loans.name: Zingatia Group

texts.en:
Lukresia, who is in her mid-30s, is married and has one child who goes to school. 

She has been selling charcoal for seven years now. She works from 6:15 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.
 
This will be Lukresia's 14th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase her charcoal stock, managed to open another charcoal store and has paid back all her loans successfully. Lukresia and her family are really happy with the loan. She used the profit to pay school fees for her child, to cover household expenses, and to buy some bricks and iron sheets. She will use this loan to buy more sacks of charcoal to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to make her charcoal stores extraordinary big.
 
Lukresia will share this with her loan group "Zinatia," which has nine members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Dora Luz

texts.es: Dora Luz, una joven madre de 31 años de edad, habita en el barrio Laureles norte una zona un poco peligrosa, ella ha sido una mujer trabajadora que busca como salir adelante junto a su familia, por eso vende todo el día café, pan y  pastel de manera ambulante por las calles para que sus hijos puedan estudiar y valerse por sí solos, su esposo es albañil y le ayuda a pagar los gastos del hogar. El crédito que solicita es para iniciar la construcción del muro frontal de su vivienda, que le permitirá mayor seguridad y estabilidad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Dora Luz is a young thirty-one year old mother. She lives in Laureles Norte, a neighbourhood that is a bit dangerous. 

She is a hard-working woman who is attempting to make some progress, together with her family. This is why she spends all day walking the streets to sell coffee, bread and pastries. She does this so her children can study and make do by themselves. Her husband is a bricklayer and he helps her to cover household expenses. 

The loan that she is requesting is to begin constructing an exterior wall for their home that will provide her children with greater security and stability.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, iron and sand.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a 26-year-old single lady who has worked in the beauty business for the past eight years. In 2009, she opened her own beauty salon to improve her earnings and her socioeconomic situation. Zeinab works hard, loves her work a lot, and seeks perfection. She studied at a technical school to teach kindergarten but has found herself in the beauty business. Zeinab hopes to develop her business to make it number one in her area.

Zeinab is requesting a youth loan from the Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a special tanning machine that is requested by her customers. Acquiring this machine will add value to her business and attract new customers in the region who are seeking such a service.

loans.use: to buy a special tanning machine

loans.name: Kyaitamba Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
Francis is a 39-year-old married man with two children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He works running a retail shop and also as a photographer to boost his income. His main business challenge is inadequate capital. He is a member of the Kyaitamba Tweimukye Group loan group, which holds members responsible for guaranteeing a loan.

Francis is requesting a loan to buy sugar, salt, and soap to sell. In the future, his vision is to work hard to accumulate more wealth.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, and soap to sell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 28 years old, married to Jane, and blessed with one child, age 7 years. 

He provides transport services with his motorbike, a business he started four years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. 

He has requested a fourth loan of KES 40,000 to add on the amount he has saved in order to purchase another motorbike. The profit he earns will help him expand this business. 

He hopes to see his business grow.

loans.use: To purchase another motorbike.

loans.name: Efren

texts.en:
This is Efren. He previously accessed an 16,000 PHP loan that he used to buy spare parts, accessories and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

He would like to apply for a 21,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. 

Efren dreams that his business will continue and become stable. He meets every week with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of their tricycle unit.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 50-year-old married woman with five children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. 

For eight years she has been running a retail shop and also selling bananas to earn a living. With the profits she has been able to pay fees for her children, although it is still a big challenge since her dream is to educate them to university level.

Esther is requesting a loan to buy more bananas to sell.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul. 45 years old, is from Majengo. Kakamega County, which is located in the western part of Kenya. Married to Monica, a business lady who provides an extra income to the family, he supports three people in his family including two children who are five and two years old.

Paul, who has been selling cereals for the last six years, also own a posho-mill; both enterprises earn him a monthly income of KES. 7,000. He has requested his second loan from KADET LTD to purchase more maize and beans for resale. He will reinvest the anticipated profit in the business.

Paul's dream is to have a stable income.

loans.use: To purchase more maize and beans for resale.

loans.name: Las Tejedoras De Luminoche Group

texts.es:
La señora Deicy Migdalia de estado civil unida de hecho, tiene 21 años de edad, cursó 6 años de educaión primaria, tiene 2 hijos y 1 de ellos esta estudiando, ella se dedica a la agricultura siembra de café, inició este negocio ahorrando un pequeño capital con su esposo para su cultivo, y hasta la fecha lleva 8 años de experiencia.

Decide organizar un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de insumos para poder construir un almágico de café, en el futuro quiere tener mas terreno para poder cultivarlo con café, las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a actividades agrícolas y elaboracion de cortes y guipiles tipicos.
texts.en:
Deicy Migdalia is 21 years old, in a civil union, and has two children, one of whom is in school.  She went to six years of primary school.  She works growing coffee.  She started this business by saving a little capital with her husband for her crop and has eight years of experience.

She decided to organize a group and request a loan that she will use to purchase supplies to build a coffee seedbed.  In the future, she wants to have more land to be able to plant with coffee.  

The other group members work in agriculture and making traditional cuts and blouses.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to build a coffee seedbed.

loans.name: Melicio

texts.en:
Melicio manages his 2.6 hectares of rice field, 2.5 square meters of fish pond and hog-raising business. He is married and blessed with two children.

He is thankful because, through his wife's support, financial assistance was obtained from lenders and, with his determination in life, he was able to keep his businesses productive and profitable.

Melicio still hopes for the continuous growth of his businesses, so he is asking for a bigger loan amounting to PHP 50,000. He knows that this amount of loan will enable him to ensure his rice field with necessary farm supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides and seedlings. He believes that his own success depends on how well he will handle all his businesses. He hopes that the lenders will grant his loan request for his business to become more productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides and seedlings and to use in preparing his rice plot.,

loans.name: Elpedia

texts.en:
Elpedia is a 48-year-old married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She has eight children.The oldest child is 23 while the youngest is 8.

She engages in a food vending business. She sells snack foods like buchi. (Buchi is a rice cake made from sweet rice flour that is molded into shape with a sweet bean paste filling. This delectable treat is deep fried under high heat before serving.) 

Elpedia requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy flour, cooking oil and margarine, to increase her production and thus her income. In the future, Elpedia would like to expand her business to support her family and also to save to finance her children's educations.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil and margarine.

loans.name: Sanaa’

texts.en:
Sanaa’ is a conservative lady. She asked her husband to appear in the photo instead.

Sanaa’ was born in 1982. She is married and has five children. Her husband has four years of experience in planting and owns a plantation near his house that contains various types of plants. 

Now she is requesting a loan to help him expand his project and add more plants to earn enough money to cover their children needs.

loans.use: to add more plants to his plantation.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Due to the growing needs of her family, Erlinda engages in buying and selling of vegetables in her village to help her husband in generating income. She is 55 years old and has five adult-aged children. Being a responsible parent, she aims to improve their status of living to give their children a better life. 

In this regard, Erlinda planned to continue and improve her business to earn sufficient income. She is asking for additional capital of 12,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) from Kiva lenders to buy additional stock of vegetables like eggplant, bitter melon, squash, okra, camote tops and beans to sell. With the loan, she is very positive that she can provide for the demand of her valued customers, which will result in a higher income.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of vegetables like eggplant, bitter melon, squash, okra, camote tops and beans to sell.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal is a 30-year-old married mother of one child. She has worked as a wedding and special events photographer since 12 years ago. She is also employed in a studio during the daytime. Her husband is employed too, but unfortunately with a low income. Their combined salary is below the acceptable line to live a healthy life. 

Jamal decided to contact Al Majmoua because she needs a youth loan to buy a new updated camera that is necessary to keep her business in an excellent quality to keep her customers pleased and to attract new ones.

Jamal had some financial difficulties at the beginning to start her business. Today, she is working hard to open her own photography studio, which would be her dream come true, she claims.

loans.use: To buy a new updated camera.

loans.name: Rosalia Roxana

texts.es: La Sra. Rosalía tiene 30 años y tiene dos hijos de las edades de 10 y un año,  ella se dedica a la venta de calzados de segunda mano,  en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en una populosa feria de ciudad de el alto este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Rosalía va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un motor y mantenimiento para su vehículo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital ya que su vehículo está presentando alguna fallas y esto le perjudica en su negocio ya que este es el que transporta con su mercadería a su puesto de venta,  La Sra. Rosalía enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que hay muchas personas que se dedican a esta actividad, va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes.
texts.en:
Rosalía is 30 years old and has two children aged ten and one. She makes a living selling second-hand shoes on her stall, located in a popular market in El Alto. This is her first loan with the organisation. Rosalía is going to use this loan to buy an engine and service her vehicle. Her reason for requesting this loan is that she lacks capital and her vehicle is showing signs of problems, which is harming her business, as she uses it to transport her merchandise to her stall. 

Rosalía faces challenges in her business, such as competition, since lots of people make a living in this way. She is going to use her profits to continue improving her stall. Her dream for her business is to have a good stock of merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy an engine and service her vehicle.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es: La socia Nieves nació en la ciudad de Pilco – Grande y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene 42 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y también a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y otros, ella requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes, ella está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas. (La comunidad de Pilco – Grande está ubicado en el distrito de Huayllabamba dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo en el  departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Nieves was born in the city of Pilco - Grande where she still lives.  She is 42 years old, has a common-law husband and six children.  She works in agriculture and livestock farming and also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and others.  She is in need of a loan to buy small animals such as guinea pigs.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying ti back on time.

(The Pilco - Grande Community is located in the district of Huayllabamba in the province of Paucartambo, department of Cusco, Perú).

loans.use: To buy small animals such as guinea pigs.

loans.name: Chiquilense Group

texts.es:
La señora Alicia de estado civil casada tiene 40 años de edad, curso 1 año de educación primaria, tiene 6 hijos y 4 de ellos estan estudiando, ella se dedica a la siembra de café, inició este negocio comprando una plantitas de café con su esposo, luego compraron otras y luego otras y hasta la fecha lleva ya 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de fertilizante para hecharle a su cultivo de café, en el futuro desea tener mas terreno con mas planta de café y asi obtener más cosecha; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a sembrar café, maíz y otras se dedican a tejer. en la fotografía aparecen 12 integrantes pero solo a 11 se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Alicia is married. She is forty years old, completed one year of primary education, and has six children. Four of them are in school. She works growing coffee crops and started her business by purchasing some small coffee plants with her husband. They later purchased more and more plants and she now has ten years of experience. 

She organizes a group and is requesting a loan. She will use it to purchase fertilizer for her coffee crops. She wants to have more land in the future, and more coffee plants so that she may obtain a greater harvest.

Some of the other members of this group work growing coffee beans and corn, and others work weaving. Twelve members appear in the photo, but only eleven were granted the loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow coffee beans.

loans.name: Dúo Manos A La Obra Group

texts.es: Dúo Manos a la obra, este grupo esta formado por la señora Elvia Nohemi de 31 años de edad originaria de acatenango, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos desde hace varios años,tambien como activiada originaria se dedica a la venta de maiz por quintal, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para la venta y tambien para la elaboracion y venta de tortillas.espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito ya que de esa forma ella podra aumentar sus venta y a travez de las venta ella pueda ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: One of the members of the communal bank "Dúo Manos a la Obra" is Elvia Nohemi, who is 31 and hails from Acatenango.  She has been making and selling regional woven fabrics for several years.  She also sells corn in bulk.   The loan she is requesting is to buy corn to sell and also to make tortillas, which she sells.  She is hoping she can count on you for support so she can increase sales and help her family.

loans.use: To buy corn to sell and to make tortillas.

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es: María, tiene 54 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad, ella vive con su esposo y una sobrina en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Esparta Atlántida. Ella inicio vendiendo comidas y con sus ahorros logro su sueño de tener una tiendita donde vende variedad de productos como ser ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, cosméticos y otras variedades. El negocio lo tiene establecido en su casa y esta ubicado en un lugar estratégico para la venta. Lo ha mantenido estable mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. Actualmente solicita el séptimo préstamo que es por 25,000 Lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de más ropa y cosméticos. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio para obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
María is 54 years old, married and she has four adult children.  She lives with her husband and a niece in a small town that belongs to the municipality of Esparta Atlántida.  She began selling food and with her savings she achieved her dream of having a little store where she sells a variety of products such as clothing for ladies, gentlemen and children, cosmetics and other assorted things.  She has established the business in her home and it is located in a strategic place for sales.  She has kept it stable through the investment of several loans.  

Currently she is requesting a seventh loan for 25,000 Lempiras (HNL) and she is going to invest it in the purchase of more clothing and cosmetics.  Her plan is to make her business grow in order to obtain greater revenue.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and cosmetics to stock her business.

loans.name: Julio Adalberto

texts.es: Don Julio de la edad de 47 años es un hombre muy trabajador quien vive junto a su compañera de vida. Él posee un negocio de transporte Express a través de su vehículo un pick-up de su propiedad, realiza este trabajo desde hace ya 12 años, es gracias a este trabajo como él puede cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, don julio esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito por medio del cual pueda invertir en repuesto para el vehiculo y darle mantenimiento ya que con lo que gana de su trabajo no le alcanza para cubrir eso gastos y asi podre seguir trabajando ya que su vehículo es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto a su esposa.
texts.en: Don Julio, 47 years old, is a hardworking man who lives with his life partner. He uses his pickup truck to run an express transport service. He has been doing this work for 12 years, and it has allowed him to cover some of his household expenses. Julio is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that he will invest in purchasing parts for and maintaining his vehicle, since he does not earn enough to cover those costs. That will allow him to keep working, since his vehicle is his only source of income and gives him and his wife greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy parts for and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Aracely Del Rosario

texts.es:
Aracely es una humilde mujer originaria de una comunidad que lleva por nombre la Thompson ubicada en la parte norte de la Ciudad de Estelí Nicaragua, su estado civil es casada tiene un hijo en edad escolar, esta señora se caracteriza por ser honrada y muy trabajadora.

Su oficio es obrera del tabaco en una fábrica el cual su trabajo consiste en preparar el tabaco o es decir secarlo, darle las condiciones necesarias a la hoja de tabaco para luego elaborar el puro, son cuatro años lo que tiene de realizar esta actividad y con sus ingresos lo destina para los gasto del hogar.

Con el financiamiento otorgado lo va destinar para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como perlines zinc ya que necesita mejorar el techo de su vivienda por que se encuentra en mal estado y época de lluvia se moja.

A la misma vez agradece a kiva por el apoyo brindado ya que de esta manera podrá mejorar su vivienda y darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Aracely is a humble woman from a community called Thompson which is located in the north of the city of Estelí, in Nicaragua.  She is married and has one school-age son.  This lady is noted for being honest and very hard-working.

Aracely works in a factory where her job consists of preparing tobacco by drying it and ensuring the leaf is in the right condition for later making cigars.  She has been in this job for four years and she uses her income to cover her household expenses.

Aracely will use the loan she is being given to buy building supplies such as roof battens and metal sheets as she needs to improve the roof of her house which is in a bad state of repair.  During rainy weather everything becomes damp.

Aracely thanks Kiva for the support they are providing because it will enable her to improve her home and provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building supplies - metal sheets and roof battens

loans.name: Osmar Antonio

texts.es:
Condega  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Estelí, conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora, vive  en una comunidad aledaña osmar  con su esposa y su hijo al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles su estudios, de profesión, agricultor, en granos básicos y ganadero en  ganado de leche y repasto de novillos. 

conocido como una persona honesta y emprendedora, tiene más de 15 años de experiencia y trabajar estos rubros, trabaja junto con su familia en su finca que es alta mente productiva y quiere sacarle un buen provecho explotándola en uno de los mejores rubros de la zona como es el ganado.
 
Hoy en día está solicitando un crédito donde piensa Salir  beneficiado y  comprar  dos  novillos de engorde para repasto, luego venderlos ya que estos tendrán el peso necesario para la  venta en el matadero y de esta manera él obtener otros ingresos que le ayudará a mejorar mas su finca y el nivel económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Condega is a municipality located in the north part of the department of Estelí. It is known as the land of pottery makers because of the crafts made there and the hardworking people. Osmar lives in a small town with his wife and son, for whom he must provide and also pay for schooling. He farms basic grains and also raises dairy cattle and fattens young steers.

He is known to be an honest and entrepreneurial person. He has more than 15 years of experience working in this business. He works alongside his family on his farm, which is very productive. He wants to get good production from it by using it in one of the best lines of business in the area, which is cattle raising. 

He is requesting to buy two young steers for fattening, and then later sell them when they have the necessary weight for sale to the slaughterhouse. In this way he will earn the income that will help him to improve his farm and his family’s economic situation.

loans.use: to buy two young steers for fattening

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Ella posee una tienda de productos comestibles como pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos en el hogar. La clienta solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en: The client lives in her own home with her husband and children. She is a responsible, hardworking mother who has been a good provider for her family. She has a grocery store where she sells bread, soft drinks, oils, fruits and vegetables, sweets, and staples such as soap and shampoo. She runs the store out of her house and with her income from the store and her husband's help is able to cover some household expenses. The client is requesting a loan to increase her stock to meet her customers' demands and improve her sales, which is her main priority in supporting her household.

loans.use: to buy bread, soft drinks, oil, fruits and vegetables, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es originaria de la ciudad de Estelí reconocida como la capital del tabaco ubicada en la parte  norte de Nicaragua, su estado civil es soltera, su edad es 58 años y tiene tres hijos todos ellos independiente.

Actualmente se desempeña como jefa de área de producción de una fábrica de puro desde hace diez años con su salario sostiene los gastos del hogar y apoya a su madre que esta de edad muy avanzada y con problema de salud.

Con el financiamiento otorgado lo va destinar para la compra de medicamentos y pago de exámenes médicos de su madre, a la misma ves agradece a kiva por el apoyo brindado ya que de esta manera va ser posible la compra de medicamento y realizar los exámenes medico ya que con sus ingresos se le hace más difícil asumir lo alto costo que cuesta la salud de su familiar.
texts.en:
Carmen is from the city of Estelí, a city which is located in the north of Nicaragua and known as the 'tobacco capital'.  She is 58 years old, single, and has three children who all live independently.

Carmen currently works as a production manager in a cigar factory.  She has been in this job for ten years and uses her salary to cover her household expenses and support her mother who is very elderly and has health problems.

Carmen will use her loan to buy medicines and pay for some medical checkups for her mother.  She is grateful to Kiva for their support because it will enable her to buy medicine and pay for medical checkups.  Using her income alone, it would be very difficult to cover her family member's high health expenses.

loans.use: to buy medicines and pay for medical checkups for her mother

loans.name: German Salet

texts.es:
German tiene  41 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos. Él se dedica a prestar sus servicios como seguridad en el puerto, desde hace cuatro años. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar un vehiculo para transportarse a su trabajo. Debido a que cuando finaliza su jornada laboral es muy noche o demasiado temprano y no encuentra transporte para regresar a su casa; por lo que se hace necesario poseer un vehiculo propio.
texts.en:
German, 41, has a common-law wife and two children.  He works as a security guard at the port, where he has been for four years.

The loan he is requesting through Fundación Campo is to buy a vehicle to drive to work.  At the end of his work day it is too late to find transportation to get home, as is the case in the early morning when he leaves for work.  So this is why he needs a vehicle of his own.

loans.use: To buy a vehicle to drive to work.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca  es una señora de 46 años de edad, casada, actualmente tiene 4 hijos quienes son  1 hombre y 3 mujeres  viven en  la Aldea Xojolá, municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá
Ella se dedica al cultivo y venta de banano silvestre, a través de  esta actividad obtiene buenos ingresos económicos que le ayudan al sostenimiento de su familia. 
Lleva 4 años realizando esta labor; además de esta actividad ella también se dedica a la elaboración y venta de fajas (cinturón que utilizan las mujeres de su comunidad).
Ella solicita un préstamo de Q 6,000.00 para compra de fertilizante para el mantenimiento de banano.
Sueña con comprar más terreno apto para el cultivo de banano y maxan, y con ello incrementar sus ventas y ganancias.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 46-year-old woman who is married and currently has 4 children, 1 son and 3 daughters. They live in the Aldea Xojolá, a municipality of Nahualá, in the department of Sololá. She makes her living growing and selling wild bananas. She has made good sales from this activity which help her to support her family.

She has been working for four years in this area, as well as this activity, she also makes her living producing and selling fajas (woven belt worn by the women in her community). She is seeking a loan of 6,000.00 Quetzales to buy fertilizers to upkeep the banana plantation. 

Francisca dreams of buying more land suitable to grow banana plants and maxan plants (Calathea lutea) and as such increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to upkeep the banana plantation.

loans.name: Maria Genoveva

texts.es: Doña Maria de 61 años de edad posee un mini súper en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene 6 años de tenerlo, es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable y honesta, tiene muchos clientes pues los atiende muy bien cuando le llegan a comprar, vive en casa propia con su hija y su nietos, doña Maria esta solicitando un crédito para poder surtir su negocio con mas mercadería como: Aceites, huevo, granos básicos, sopas, shampoo, desodorantes, jabones, etc. y para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 61-year old Maria has had a mini supermarket in the market close to her home for six years. She is a very hard-working, responsible, and honest woman. She has many customers because she attends to them very well when they come to buy things. She lives in her own house with her daughter and her grandchildren. Maria is requesting a loan so she can stock her business with more merchandise, such as oil, eggs, staple grains, soup, shampoo, deodorants, and soap. This will enable her to obtain better profits and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy oil, eggs, staple grains, soup, shampoo, deodorant, soap, etc

loans.name: Eddy Alberto

texts.es:
Eddy, de 29 años de edad, de oficio comerciantes, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, tiene un hijo reciennacido. A los 24 años inicio su actividad anteriormente el vendía carne a las pulperías pero se retiró de este negocio porque lo asaltaron quitándole todo lo que tenia . Pero un familiar le presto dinero para que empezara de nuevo y el decidió vender ropa usada ya tiene tres años con este negocio, tiene un pequeños puesto donde vende atuendos de todo precio. 
El usara el financiamiento para comprar ropa usada tales como pantalones, camisetas, shorts, blusas etc.  Pues desea ir mejorando su inventario y mejorar las condiciones de su local para darle una mejor presentación a su negocio.
texts.en: Eddy is 29 and a small businessman who sells used clothing. He is the father of a newborn child. Eddy was first self-employed at 24, when he began selling meat to grocery stores. But he gave up this business after losing everything he had in a robbery. A family member loaned him money to start over and Eddy decided to sell used clothing. He has run this business for three years and has a small shop where he sells clothing at all price levels. Eddy will use the loan to purchase used clothing such as pants, shirts, shorts, blouses, etc. He wants to expand his inventory and improve conditions at his shop in order to create a better business environment.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new oven.

loans.name: Las Comerciantes Group

texts.es:
María (segunda de izquierda a derecha en la fotografía) es la líder del Grupo Las Comerciantes es una señora  de 30 años de edad, casada,  quien  tiene 2 hijos,  ellos viven en la Aldea Guineales, Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, departamento de Sololá.
Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica desde hace 5 años; esta labor la aprendió de sus padres que se dedicaban a lo mismo. La venta de su producto la lleva a cabo en el mercado local de su comunidad. Ella realiza esto porque es el medio que le genera ingresos que utiliza para el sostenimiento de su familia.
Ella es visionaria y por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de más cortes y blusas para vender más e incrementar sus ingresos.
Sueña hacer crecer su negocio y con ello puede tener los recursos suficientes para brindarles educación a sus hijos para afrontar el futuro de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
María (second from left to right in the photograph) is the leader of the group Las Comerciantes [The Businesswomen].  She is a 30-year old woman, married, with 2 children.  They live in the small town of Guineales, in Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, department of Sololá.  

She has made a living buying and selling traditional clothing for 5 years.  She learned this trade from her parents, who made their living the same way.  She sells her product in the local market in her community.  She does this because it is the means that generates income that she uses to support her family.

She is a visionary and this is why she is applying for a loan to buy more traditional skirts and blouses in order to sell more and increase her earnings.  She dreams of growing her business and with that, she can have sufficient resources to provide her children with an education so that they can better face the future.

loans.use: to buy more traditional skirts and blouses in order to sell more and increase her income.

loans.name: Mariza

texts.es:
Mariza tiene 33 años de edad tiene 2 hijos, la familia en conjunto vive en una casa hecha de adobe que ella compró junto a su pareja.Se dedica a la agricultura hace 14 años y es propietaria de un terreno agrícola de 6 hectáreas en donde posee plantaciones de cacao, café, maní y otros productos para llevar.
Se siente muy bien con su trabajo porque es una labor que también realizaban sus padres de quienes aprendió el oficio de la agricultura, además de brindarle un buen cuidado a sus plantaciones, por eso usa abono orgánico para obtener una buena calidad de los frutos.Cuenta siempre con el apoyo de trabajadores del lugar quienes se encargan de realizar la limpieza a la maleza de sus árboles de cacao esperando que no afecte también el normal crecimiento de las plantaciones recientes.El principal inconveniente que tiene es trasladar los sacos con los granos secos de sus productos hasta la ciudad en donde están los acopiadores que le pagan buenos precios por sus cosechas.Al tener un área de cultivo considerable es necesario siempre contar con personal de apoyo.
